issue.title: [CF 1201] Change spec lua error on meta icon
issue.body:
Hello, not sure if its the right place to post,  but looking for some help debugging an error.
On my hunter I have meade a lot of custom alerts, icons check spells castable, buff that are up etc.

Anyway each time I change spec from Besat mastery to Marksmanship I get the following error:

""31x ...llMeWhen\Components\IconTypes\IconType_meta\meta.lua:191: attempt to index field 'IconsLookup' (a nil value)
...llMeWhen\Components\IconTypes\IconType_meta\meta.lua:191: in function <...llMeWhen\Components\IconTypes\IconType_meta\meta.lua:184>
(tail call): ?
[C]: ?
[string "safecall Dispatcher[2]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[2]"]:5>
(tail call): ?
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.4.0.lua:1618: in function `Fire'
[string "SetInfo reverse"]:75: in function `?'
TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:1309: in function `SetInfo'
...ns\TellMeWhen\Components\Core\IconDataProcessors.lua:481: in function <...ns\TellMeWhen\Components\Core\IconDataProcessors.lua:480>
(tail call): ?
[C]: ?
[string "safecall Dispatcher[3]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[3]"]:5>
...
TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:769: in function `DisableIcon'
TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Group-Group.lua:524: in function <TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Group.lua:440>
(tail call): ?
[C]: ?
[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:5>
(tail call): ?
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.4.0.lua:3214: in function `UpdateNormally'
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.4.0.lua:3348: in function `Update'
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.4.0.lua:3356: in function `?'
...faceElvUI\libs\AceTimer-3.0\AceTimer-3.0-17.lua:53: in function <...faceElvUI\libs\AceTimer-3.0\AceTimer-3.0.lua:48>

Locals:
nil
""
I have spec specific profile metaicons which are checking group icons , I upload a screen if this may help to describe my problem

Help would be greatly appreciated.

IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Similarly, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type for your issue, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Naphades | Imported from CurseForge issue #1201 | Raw
